welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eunice, USA! Where the charm of small-town living meets the excitement of Cajun culture. Get ready to indulge in delicious food, lively music, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Landry Parish Airport provides check-in, baggage claim, and boarding services for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Landry Parish Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport.
